title: Yaroslav the Wise
summary: Yaroslav the Wise or Yaroslav I[lower-alpha 1] (c. 978 – 20 February 1054) was the Grand Prince of Kiev from 1019 until his death. He was also the Prince of Novgorod on three occasions, uniting the principalities for a time. Yaroslav's baptismal name was George (Old East Slavic: Гюрьгi, Gjurĭgì) after Saint George.
